Type.Name: MnemonicActivatedArgs

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MnemonicActivatedArgs extends GLib.SignalArgs

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: The event invokes delegates which pass event data via this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Create a new instance with this constructor if you need to invoke a delegate.

Docs.summary: Whether or not the mnemonic group acts as a loop.
Docs.value: A boolean, true if the group cycles.
